text:
Singapore | TradeGecko | Software Engineers | https://tradegecko.com

We're a well funded growing startup of 70+ people based in tropical Singapore. We're looking for web engineers to join our growing team. We work with Rails + Ember.js, Redis.

We're changing the way the worlds SMB businesses transact with our SaaS inventory & order management platform.

We're currently looking for people in or willing to relocate to Singapore.

email me at cameron [at] tradegecko.com
